detail.content: Camera Lighting & Advanced Production Sound Collaboration Wksp: Tisch School of the Arts at NYU                           Skip to content        Undergraduate Film & Television Admissions About the Program Course Offerings Summer Courses Showcase Internships Facilities Special Projects First Run & Festivals Calendar of Events News TSOA FTV Wiki Admin & Faculty Alumni Blog Facebook Twitter YouTube  home > Undergraduate Film & TV        Camera Lighting & Advanced Production Sound Collaboration Wksp  FMTV-UT.1062 Intermediate 3 Credits Course may not be repeated. Prerequisite: Camera I (FMTV-UT 1065) Students shoot light exercises on 16mm and Super 16 with assistance and criticism from the instructor. The students in this class work with Advanced Sound students on the creative application of lighting and all students will get to shoot at least one day.
